remarks: Theorem *4.83 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 122, for decidable propositions. As with other case elimination theorems, like ~ pm2.61dc , it only holds for decidable propositions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 12-May-2018.)
statement: pm4.83dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ( ph -> ps ) /\ ( -. ph -> ps ) ) <-> ps ) ) $.
